column4: Hi guys, I need a liitle help with Bzflag, I am trying to install the debian package but i get the following error bzflag depends on libcurl3 (>= 7.13.0-1); however Version of libcurl3 on system is 7.12.3-2ubuntu3.   Im really sorry if this sounds silly but i am a little new to linux
try apt-get dist-upgrade/upgrade.. you may have some deps problem
